ActPlant Protection Act
PrecisREGULATION AMENDING PHYTOPHTHORA RAMORUM COMPENSATION REGULATIONS which provide for the payment of compensation to nursery owners and others affected by efforts to eradicate Phytophthora ramorum, a fungus causing Sudden Oak Death which has infected areas in British Columbia.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2007-0287 Publication Date: 2007-12-26
AttachmentsAttachment
